content: this is a rewritten pattern based upon a bootie i made from christal s pattern www ravelry com/patterns/library/impatiently-waiting-for-baby-booties which has since become unavailable i made this pattern from a bootie i made using her original pattern so full credit to christal for this i only wrote it up and made it available once more original pattern calls for 5 ply and 2 75mm hook i substituted with 4 ply and 3 mm hook to make newborn size booties however if you up to 8ply and adjust hook to 3 5 or 4 mm you can make them to fit up to 3 months or more you will get a pdf download for this with my own photos used of how the rewritten pattern appears
